definitions.definition: Any horse used in horse- cavalry , but especially one bearing an armoured knight .
An experienced person who has been through many battles, situations or contests; someone who has given long service.
A regularly revived theatrical or musical work, as with Hamlet or a Beethoven symphony, or as excerpts thereto. May imply that the work in question has become hackneyed .

main_definition: ( historical , military ) Any horse used in horse- cavalry , but especially one bearing an armoured knight .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative , informal ) An experienced person who has been through many battles, situations or contests; someone who has given long service.
( theater , music ) A regularly revived theatrical or musical work, as with Hamlet or a Beethoven symphony, or as excerpts thereto. May imply that the work in question has become hackneyed .
